data.text:
Hello Everyone, in this article you will get to know about LeBron James Biography, Age, Height, Wife, Son, Shoes, Salary, Income and Net Worth.

Who is LeBron James?

LeBron Raymone James Sr. famously known as LeBron James is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association.

James has won four NBA championships, 4 NBA MVP awards, 4 NBA Finals MVP awards, 3 All-Star MVP awards, and 2 Olympic gold medals. James has scored the most points in the playoffs, the second-most career points, and has the seventh-most career assists. He has been selected an NBA All-Star 18 times, to the All-NBA Team a record 18 times, and to the NBA All-Defensive First Team five times.

He has competed in ten NBA Finals, the third-most all-time, including eight consecutively between 2011 and 2018. In 2021, James was selected to the NBA 75th Anniversary Team. he is widely considered one of the greatest players of all time and is often compared to Michael Jordan in debates over the greatest basketball player ever.

LeBron James Biography

LeBron James Career

LeBron James started playing organized basketball in fifth grade. He later played Amateur Athletic Union (AAU) basketball for the Northeast Ohio Shooting Stars. The team enjoyed success on a local and national level, led by James and his friends Sian Cotton, Dru Joyce III, and Willie McGee.

The group dubbed themselves the “Fab Four” and promised each other that they would attend high school together. 27 In a move that stirred local controversy, they chose to attend St. Vincent-St. Mary High School, a private Catholic school with predominantly white students.

LeBron was born on 30 December 1984 in Akron, Ohio, US. He is currently 39 years old.

LeBron James Family

There are six members in LeBron James’s family including his mother Gloria James, his wife Savannah James, and his three children Bronny, Bryce, and Zhuri James.

LeBron James Education and Qualification

LeBron James did his schooling at St. Vincent-St. Mary High School in Akron and he never went to college.

LeBron James Height, Weight, and Body Measurement

LeBron James Official Handles

LeBron James Cars Collection

LeBron James has a total of 10 cars in his collection some of them are Rolls-Royce Cullinan, Ferrari F430 Spyder, Porsche 918 Spyder, Lamborghini Aventador Roadster, and many more.

LeBron James Income Sources

LeBron’s income comes from various sources like the NBA, Endorsements, and Investments. During his first 10 seasons in the NBA, LeBron James earned just over $126 Million in salary alone.

During that same period, LeBron earned an estimated $326 Million from Advertisements. That’s $452 Million from his first decade as a Professional.

LeBron signed a two-year $85 Million Contract Extension with the Lakers. By the time that contract is up in 2023, LeBron will have earned $428 million in NBA Salaries.

LeBron James Salary from NBA

LeBron James Properties

LeBron James Net Worth

LeBron James’ income comes from various sources like the NBA, Endorsements, Investments, etc. He is one of the highest-paid athletes in the world.

According to Forbes, The estimated Net worth of LeBron James is around $1 Billion. The estimated Net Worth of LeBron James is around 776 Crore in Indian rupees.
